meanings.sent1: The foetid garbage left outside the house made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent2: The foetid socks in the laundry basket needed to be washed immediately.
meanings.sent3: The foetid smell coming from the fridge was a reminder to clean out the leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The foetid stench of decay hung heavy in the air, causing discomfort to all.
meanings.sent5: The foetid aroma of the swamp was so strong it could be tasted in the air.

meanings.sent1: The foetid cheese left out on the counter was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The foetid alley behind the restaurant was avoided by pedestrians.
meanings.sent3: The foetid odor from the skunk made the dog run away in fear.
meanings.sent4: The foetid fumes from the factory filled the town with a noxious haze.
meanings.sent5: The foetid scent of decay wafted from the old cellar, causing unease among the visitors.

meanings.sent1: The foetid meat left in the sun attracted flies within minutes.
meanings.sent2: The foetid swamp was home to creatures that thrived in the murky waters.
meanings.sent3: The foetid garbage bin behind the house was a magnet for raccoons at night.
meanings.sent4: The foetid stench of the sewers permeated the city streets after heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The foetid smell of the decaying fruit filled the kitchen with a nauseating aroma.
